Content.Text:
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Weren't you happy with the hairstyle I
gave you? If you do your hair more than
once a day, it will get damaged.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>So you just run along home now!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome to <GREEN>Allen's Salon</GREEN>.
How may I help you today?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
The same hairstyle and color as before?
Bo-ring!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Of course.
I'll do your hair that way now.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Here is your new hairstyle!
Do you feel different?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There, it's done!
<PAGE>
You seem to be paying more attention
to looking fashionable these days.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH><MYNAME>, you've become one of my
steady customers! How marvelous.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ah, it's done...
<MYNAME>, even guys need to take proper
care of their hair, don't you know?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>Your hair was SO grody!
Make sure you take a bath regularly!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ah, it's done...
<MYNAME>, as a woman, you really should
care for your hair better.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>Your hair was so grody!
Make sure you take a bath regularly!
<PAGE>
Otherwise, how do you hope to win a man?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ah, it's done...
<MYNAME>, why aren't you taking better
care of your hair?
<PAGE>
Your hair was so grody!
Make sure you take a bath regularly!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>I'm sure work keeps you
busy, but since you ARE my princess too,
please take better care of yourself!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What, you've decided not to go through
with it? Well then, come again.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome to <GREEN>Allen's Salon</GREEN>.
This is your first visit, isn't it?
<PAGE>
Here I can give you the <RED>hairstyle</RED>
and <RED>hair color</RED> of your choice.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>The styling fee is well worth
it to feel like a new you! Please make
use of my services often.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Now, what do you want me to do with
your hair today, hmm?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, another perfect hair creation by
me! Which goes without saying...

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Mmm-mmm!
Would you just LOOK at my technique?
No other stylist can match my skills!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
All done!
Do you like it?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, it's done!
Don't you feel like a new you?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It took a little time, but the results
are fabulous!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Mistake? I NEVER make a mistake
when I style hair.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
The same hairstyle and color as before?
Your tastes are so boring!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Of course, it's YOUR hair, <MYNAME>.
I am merely a professional hairstylist,
what do I know? So here we go!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
The same hairstyle and color as before?
No opportunity for me to show off my
genius in hair styling, then...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Ah, such is life!
Let's get started on that hair.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, have you really come to the
salon today for the same old hair?
Denying me a canvas for my genius?
<PAGE>
Oh princess, what CAN I do with you?
Well, I'll get to work on that hair.
